name: Simon Hasbun
reviewtext: I love the style and the features of the orient master. It has some really classic look.

name: Joanna Depp
reviewtext: The functions of the watch was great, without any unnecessary features.The purchase was worth it.

name: Tom Cloner
reviewtext: For this kind of money I expected the watch to be much better. I have to go for maintenance two times already. Total waste of money.

name: Laura Murphy
reviewtext: I have gotten many compliments on it so far. Elegant and attractive, easy to read and very easy to set

name: Trevor James
reviewtext: I did find the watch very much to my liking and has a hint of style and class to it in which I love.

name: Norah Henderson
reviewtext: This watch offers it all. Style, beautiful craftmanship, and functionality.
